Developing with Drupal

Drupal is a free software package that allows anyone to easily publish, manage and organize a wide variety of content on a website. Hundreds of thousands of people and organizations are using Drupal to power an endless variety of sites.

CDM Dataportal have been developed with Drupal version 5. If you want to learn or experience more about Drupal visit the Drupal's oficial site. If you already know what Drupal is and you want to configure the CDM Dataportal module to interacte with your CDM Server visit our CDM Setup->Group Installation

Enviroment Setup

The development enviroment here described is based on following elements technologies Drupal + Apache + Php + MySQL + Eclipse.

For windows Windows 1 and Windows 2. For Os X Apple

External Resources

Some useful resources for developers are the following

  • Drupal

    Useful documentation for Drupal can be founded on the Drupal official web sites, such as

    • Drupal Home
    • Drupal API, or
    • Drupal Documentation (with installation guides included).
  • JavaScript
    • JQuery
  • Firefox

    Useful Firefox addons for developers:

    • Firebug
    • Web Developer Toolbar
    • JSONView
